name: Bryce Textures File
summary: Learn about .BRT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Several preinstalled textures are available with Bryce, including textures for clouds, rocks, and sand. Textures may also be created by the user.

description: Image file used by Bryce, a program used to created 3D models and landscapes; contains a 2D graphic that can be fitted to the skeleton of a 3D model; used for painting, or texturizing, 3D models.
